name: Equilibria Kids
overview:
Equilibria Kids creates a safe, fun, and active environment aimed at empowering children. Equilibria’s children and teen psychologists utilize researched techniques and proven strategies in behavioral management, cognitive behavioral therapy, play therapy and creative arts therapy to meet your children or teens’ needs.

Be it behavioral problems, social problems, emotional issues, or more complex mental health issues, Equilibria’s staff is skilled at making the process of therapy a fun and life enhancing experience for teens and children.

We take this approach very seriously and help our child clients embrace who they are, emphasizing all of their strengths to work through and adapt to their different challenges.
